trans-unit.source: Please check the log files for detailed information.
Please configure a "dcParam" in the Extension Settings.
Please configure a "dummyUser" in the Extension Settings.
The "dummyUser" could not be found in the fe_user table
Please configure a "dummyUserPid" in the Extension Settings.
The "dummyUserPid" could not be resolved to an existing page.
You enabled the UniqueKey-Feature. For this Feature to work you need to configure a "clienSecret" in the Extension settings.
You enabled the UniqueKey-Feature. For this Feature to work you need to configure a "uniqueKeyGroup" in the Extension settings.
The "uniqueKeyGroup" could not be resolved to an existing usergroup.
You enabled the Routing-Feature. For this Feature to work you need to configure a "routingMap" in the Extension settings.
You enabled the crawling Feature. For this Feature to work you need to configure a "crawlingIP" in the Extension settings.
You enabled the DcPersonal-Feature. For this Feature to work you need to configure also the UniqueKey-Feature.
You enabled the Routing-Feature. For this Feature to work you need to configure a "dummyUser" and/or a "crawlingUser".
